description:
Easily create the right event to promote your business, for new client’s, referrals and sales. You will be able to create a great marketing tool that will attract the right type of people that need your product or service.

Whether you are a newbie, experienced sales person or an event organizer, this course will enhance and simplify your understanding of how to attract the correct types of people you want to patronize your events and business.  This course is a step-by-step process of increasing your sales and business while being designed for the first time event planner.

The best person for this course is a business or an individual looking for alternative ways to increase their business, through sales, referrals, and contacts.  Someone looking for a simpler and effective way to achieve success and grow their  business.
title: Event Planning - Creating Sales for Your Business
